attributes.action: force the declaration of the expenses of all executives and non-executive directors of taxpayer-bailed financial institutions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is abhorent that those who caused the failure of our banking system are allowed to claim expenses within their jobs that are, at least, partially funded by the taxpayer. As MP's are being forced to declare their expenses, so should those executives of banks who are involved in spending our money, the money which saved them. This campaign needs to be taken seriously.
